name: Call n8n Workflow Tool
semantic_context: Uses another n8n workflow as a tool. Allows packaging any n8n node(s) as a tool.
natural_language_description: 这是 Call n8n Workflow Tool 节点。主要用于: Uses another n8n workflow as a tool. Allows packaging any n8n node(s) as a tool.

notice.displayName: This node must be connected to an AI agent. Insert one
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: This node must be connected to an AI agent. Insert one

noticeTemplateExample.displayName: See an example of a workflow to suggest meeting slots using AI here.
noticeTemplateExample.name: noticeTemplateExample
noticeTemplateExample.natural_language_description: 参数名: See an example of a workflow to suggest meeting slots using AI here.

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the function to be called, could contain letters, numbers, and underscores only
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The name of the function to be called, could contain letters, numbers, and underscores only

executeNotice.displayName: This tool will call the workflow you define below, and look in the last node for the response. The workflow needs to start with an Execute Workflow trigger
executeNotice.name: executeNotice
executeNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: This tool will call the workflow you define below, and look in the last node for the response. The workflow needs to start with an Execute Workflow trigger

source.name: source
source.description: Where to get the workflow to execute from
source.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source | 作用: Where to get the workflow to execute from | 默认值: database
available_options: Database (值: database) - Load the workflow from the database by ID
Define Below (值: parameter) - Pass the JSON code of a workflow

workflowJson.name: workflowJson
workflowJson.description: The workflow JSON code to execute
workflowJson.natural_language_description:
参数名: Workflow JSON | 作用: The workflow JSON code to execute | 默认值: 








 | (必填项)

responsePropertyName.name: responsePropertyName
responsePropertyName.description: Where to find the data that this tool should return. n8n will look in the output of the last-executed node of the workflow for a field with this name, and return its value.
responsePropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Field to Return | 作用: Where to find the data that this tool should return. n8n will look in the output of the last-executed node of the workflow for a field with this name, and return its value. | 提示: The field in the last-executed node of the workflow that contains the response | 默认值: response | (必填项)

fields.name: fields
fields.description: These will be output by the 'execute workflow' trigger of the workflow being called
fields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Extra Workflow Inputs | 作用: These will be output by the 'execute workflow' trigger of the workflow being called | 默认值: {}

specifyInputSchema.name: specifyInputSchema
specifyInputSchema.description: Whether to specify the schema for the function. This would require the LLM to provide the input in the correct format and would validate it against the schema.
specifyInputSchema.natural_language_description: 参数名: Specify Input Schema | 作用: Whether to specify the schema for the function. This would require the LLM to provide the input in the correct format and would validate it against the schema. | 默认值: False

schemaType.name: schemaType
schemaType.description: How to specify the schema for the function
schemaType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Schema Type | 作用: How to specify the schema for the function | 默认值: fromJson
available_options: Generate From JSON Example (值: fromJson) - Generate a schema from an example JSON object
Define using JSON Schema (值: manual) - Define the JSON schema manually

jsonSchemaExample.name: jsonSchemaExample
jsonSchemaExample.description: Example JSON object to use to generate the schema

inputSchema.name: inputSchema
inputSchema.description: Schema to use for the function
